special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The priest is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): light, mending, sacred flame, spare the dying
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): light, mending, sacred flame, spare the dying

descriptions.raw: 1st level (4 slots): divine favor, guiding bolt, healing word, shield of faith
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1st level (4 slots): divine favor, guiding bolt, healing word, shield of faith

descriptions.raw: 2nd level (3 slots): lesser restoration, magic weapon, prayer of healing, silence, spiritual weapon
descriptions.hyperlinked: 2nd level (3 slots): lesser restoration, magic weapon, prayer of healing, silence, spiritual weapon

descriptions.raw: 3rd level (3 slots): beacon of hope, crusader's mantle, dispel magic, revivify, spirit guardians, water wall
descriptions.hyperlinked: 3rd level (3 slots): beacon of hope, crusader's mantle, dispel magic, revivify, spirit guardians, water wall

descriptions.raw: 4th level (3 slots): banishment, freedom of movement, guardian of faith, stoneskin
descriptions.hyperlinked: 4th level (3 slots): banishment, freedom of movement, guardian of faith, stoneskin

descriptions.raw: 5th level (1 slot): flame strike, mass cure wounds, hold monster
descriptions.hyperlinked: 5th level (1 slot): flame strike, mass cure wounds, hold monster

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The priest makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Maul.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 +3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Guided Strike (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).
descriptions: The priest grants a +10 bonus to an attack roll made by itself or another creature within 30 feet of it. The priest can make this choice after the roll is made but before it hits or misses.
